query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO item_group_metadata (item_group_metadata_id,item_group_id, header, subheader,layout,repeat_number,repeat_max, repeat_array, row_start_number,crf_version_id, item_id, ordinal,borders, show_group) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE item_group_metadata SET item_group_id=?, header=?, subheader=?,layout=?,repeat_number=?,repeat_max=?, repeat_array=?, row_start_number=?,crf_version_id=?, item_id=?, ordinal=?, borders =?, show_group=? WHERE item_group_metadata_id=?

query.name: findMetaByGroupAndSection
query.sql: select distinct igm.* from item_group_metadata igm, section s where igm.item_group_id =? and igm.crf_version_id=? and igm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id and s.section_id=? order by igm.ordinal asc

query.name: findMetaByGroupAndCrfVersion
query.sql: select distinct igm.* from item_group_metadata igm where igm.item_group_id =? and igm.crf_version_id=? order by igm.ordinal asc

query.name: findMetaByGroupAndSectionForPrint
query.sql: select distinct igm.* from item_group_metadata igm, item_form_metadata if where igm.item_group_id =? and igm.crf_version_id=? and igm.crf_version_id=if.crf_version_id and if.section_id=? and if.item_id = igm.item_id order by igm.ordinal asc

query.name: findByPK
query.sql: select igm.* from item_group_metadata igm where igm.item_group_metadata_id =?

query.name: findByItemIdAndCrfVersionId
query.sql: select igm.* from item_group_metadata igm where igm.item_id =? and igm.crf_version_id =?

query.name: findThisCrfVersionId
query.sql: select distinct crf_version_id from item_group_metadata igm where igm.crf_version_id=?

query.name: findByCrfVersionId
query.sql: select igm.* from item_group_metadata igm where igm.crf_version_id =?
